code: import React,{useState}from"react";import"./ContactMe.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ContactMe=()=>{const[formData,setFormData]=useState({email:"",mobile:"",message:""});const handleChange=e=>{setFormData({...formData,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();console.log("Form submitted:",formData);alert("Message sent successfully!");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Get In Touch"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ContactContent",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",name:"email",placeholder:"Please enter your email",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"mobile",children:"Mobile"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"tel",id:"mobile",name:"mobile",placeholder:"Enter mobile",value:formData.mobile,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"message",children:"Message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"message",name:"message",placeholder:"Enter your message",value:formData.message,onChange:handleChange,required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"submit-btn",children:"Submit >"})]})]})]});};export default ContactMe;
